SEARCH
Package com.example.quacks_app

Class ImageUpload

java.lang.Object
com.example.quacks_app.ImageUpload
public class ImageUpload extends Object
The ImageUpload class provides utility methods for managing images, including uploading, removing, and handling default profile pictures.

    • removeProfilePicture

      public static void removeProfilePicture(android.content.Context context, UserProfile userProfile, android.widget.ImageView imageView, Runnable onRemoveCallback)
      Removes the profile picture and sets a default one.
      Parameters:
      context - The context for showing messages.
      userProfile - The UserProfile object to update.
      imageView - The ImageView to update with the default image.
      onRemoveCallback - A callback to handle post-removal actions.

    • generateDefaultProfilePicture

      public static android.graphics.Bitmap generateDefaultProfilePicture(String userName)
      Generates a default profile picture bitmap with initials.
      Parameters:
      userName - The user's name to generate initials from.
      Returns:
      A Bitmap containing the profile picture.

    • uploadImageToFirebase

      public static void uploadImageToFirebase(android.content.Context context, android.net.Uri imageUri, android.widget.ImageView imageView, UserProfile userProfile, Runnable onSaveCallback)
      Uploads an image to Firebase and updates the ImageView on success.
      Parameters:
      context - The context for showing messages.
      imageUri - The URI of the image to upload.
      imageView - The ImageView to update with the uploaded image.
      userProfile - The UserProfile object to update with the image path.
      onSaveCallback - A callback to save the updated profile after uploading.

    • uploadEventPosterToFirebase

      public static void uploadEventPosterToFirebase(android.content.Context context, android.net.Uri imageUri, Event event, Runnable onSaveCallback)
      Uploads an event poster to Firebase and updates the event object with the poster path.
      Parameters:
      context - The context for showing messages.
      imageUri - The URI of the image to upload.
      event - The Event object to update with the image path.
      onSaveCallback - A callback to save the updated event after uploading.
